item.title: The Best Quotes from H.P. Lovecraft
item.description: A chieftain of the macabre and the weird, H.P. Lovecraft is one of the most influential horror writers of the 20th century. His stories are filled with the supernatural and the occult and his works have inspired many other writers, including Stephen King, Neil Gaiman, and Clive Barker. Here are some of the best quotes from H.P. Lovecraft. My very personal favorites. There are not many persons who know what wonders are opened to them in the stories and visions of their youth; for when as children we learn and dream, we think but half-formed thoughts, and when as men we try to remember, we are dulled and prosaic with the poison of life
